colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES BUM MCHOG 'DI NI SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR RGYAL PO DANG BTZAN LA SOGS SDE BRGYAD DRANG SRONG 'BYUNG PO RNAMS KYIS TSE BAS 'GRO BA MANG PO PHAN PA'I CHED DU 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MCHOD DPON PA SHES DANG PI LIG THU SHES RAB BZANG PO SOGS KYI BSKUL YANG LTAR, DPAL BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS LCAGS GYE DBYAR ZLA THA MA TSE BCU BDUN LA TSE CHOG THU NVA GRVA ZHES PA'I MA CHAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DBU MDZAD NGAG DBANG LEGS BSHAD KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
